title: Swarm
description: For some time, Michael has suspected that Wild Bill’s done more than just dabble in art. As with every other piece of his personal history, Bill plays his cards close to his chest. But when he lets on that a mural he painted before his change might still exist, Michael’s dying to see it -- and Bill’s never been good at saying no.Only fragments of the building remain, but it’s possible Wild Bill’s painting is still there. Unfortunately, there’s a lot more in the ruins than Bill and Michael bargained for.
author: Jordan Castillo Price
